Vamprah::

She smiled in mystery way... 

"I guess that Zardus will like ask our resume... But I don't know 
your name... And I guess that you like to know mine... "


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Ok, I just had Panzertron (the original owner of the Iron Fist, the 
> soon to be new Alliance base) email me the IF's stats (just the IF, 
> not including the island defences), and well, it sounds strong 
enough 
> to take out the Cybertronian Fire 20 hundred times over, so I'm 
> toning it down ALOT. Its still very strong, but I'll post the stats 
> later, when I hammer them out.
> 
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer grins. "No one expected Diamond either. We don' ussualy 
> wait around for shuttles to nearly crash into the base."
> 
> DevilDuer leans forward in his chair, looking at the two 
femms, "You 
> two'll fit in great. Diamond's an assassin, you probably are too, 
an' 
> the Alliance's had more assassins than any other team I know. 
> There're some pretty strange bots around too, though. If someone 
> starts yelling that ghosts are chasin' 'em, don' worry about it,:
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > Vamprah::
> > 
> > Vamprah didn't say anything more and fell in silence. She had 
> several 
> > things to do and asked one more time at DEvilDuel
> > 
> > "What do you think that will happen when he knows that I'm here?" 
> > Vamprah "I guess that he didn't expect my precense..."
